page.title: 09CRANAGE SCHOOL
page.content: In a school week a typical menu is :- {MONDAY Sweet and sour chicken/rice { Pineapple sponge/custard {TUESDAY Fish fingers/chips/peas/ { Apple/milkshake. {WEDNESDAY cheese/ham/baps { semolina/jam {THURSDAY sausage/potatoes/carrots/ { Iced fingers/squash/ {FRIDAY Curry/spaghetti/ { Welsh cheese cake/custard The children who have packed lunches prefer to have ham or cheese sandwiches,crisps and chocolate biscuits and some of them enjoy yoghurt.Most of them bring their own orange drinks and the children who have school lunch usvally have a flavoured drink.We all have lunch in the dining-room at long tressle tables.Some of us sit on long benches.
